DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi center study treatment-naive non-cirrhotic subject genotype 1 chronic Hepatitis C Virus . All subject receive telaprevir ( TVR ) combination sofosbuvir ( SOF ) 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Safety Study Telaprevir Sofosbuvir Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1
DOC.detailed_description: Starting Day 1 12 week , receive Telaprevir ( TVR ) Sofosbuvir ( SOF ) . You take one ( 1 ) 400 mg tablet SOF 3 tablet ( 1125 mg ) TVR . You take together mouth every morning . You take another 3 tablet ( 1125 mg ) TVR mouth 12 hour take morning dose .
